title: Screw auto attack champions
body:
Most of them you hate right? Why so? Because their power stems from clicking you, and all they really have to do is dodge abilities or outscale you. When they can easily do that, basically pros, what stops them from winning lane? An equally skilled opponent or a well timed gank. Sadly both of these are nearly non existant in a lot of games. 

Dam riot your bad at making games. Go back to lore. Seriously you would do a better movie than a video game, quit making this video game shittier, your ruining league for everyone. Make more league animated series or something. That was amazing, too bad your still pretending you give a shit about league of legends. 

Ive already moved onto other games because yours is so bad. Btw ive been trolling games for like, ever and not once gotten a suspention or even a warning. This is your game riot, love it or we won't do the same.
